note.p: Land agent, land owner, and magistrate. Son of Edward and Elizabeth Anne Wheler; a grandson of Samuel Tertius Galton. Married Mary Louisa Dugdale (1863/4–1955) in 1890. Estate agent in High Legh, Cheshire, 1881; commissioner to the duke of Northumberland in Alnwick, 1891, 1901; retired to Claverdon Leys, Warwickshire, by 1911. Assumed the additional name of Galton in 1913.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/3508/38/7), 1891 (RG12/4264/76/1), 1901 (RG13/4840/134/45), 1911 (RG14/18807)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 2 July 2019)
